We saved 100 million trees by recycling old paper products and cardboard.
We avoided 33 Million metric tons of GHG emissions and the numbers are growing.
In 2017 we achieved our goal of saving over 60 billion gallons of fresh water.
Recycle hosted and participated in more then 9000 charitable events.

This is simply the best template that I have ever worked with. I loved it and I can't wait to see what else this team comes up with. Intuitive, simple, and packed with features. The team very quickly responded to my questions. Amazing.
Amanda Green EcoPeople
What an amazing theme, beautiful design, great code, well documented and just a blessing to work with. I have worked with a lot of templates on Themeforest and i can just say that this theme is my favorite right now. Great job, keep it up!
Robert Jones Metal, Glass & Co.
This theme is awesome! The Orion team really did an unbelievable job on it. The theme is loaded with intuitive features and customizable options. The developers offer excellent support services too. Best theme your money can buy.
Andrew London ScrapCorp International
